column2: ENGLISH
Steal Spouse's Title
I shall gather some loyal men to help me take my wife's title.
I have gathered enough support form my loyal followers to try and take control of my wife's title! My men have [From.Capital.GetName] surrounded, but she has meekly surrendered.
Usurped My Title!
A woman is unfit to rule these lands!
Take your wife's title and have her rejoin your court, where she belongs.
On second thoughts I shall leave her be...
Send [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to a Mercenary Company
Send [Root.GetFirstName] to a Mercenary Company
Pay for your kinsman to train with a mercenary company where he can seek his own glory.
Send your son to train with a mercenary company for some years and hope they return as a hardened soldier.
You have decided to send your son to a mercenary company to train. His belongs are packed, are you sure you want him to go?
I hope he returns a great man!
On second thought no, he shall remain with me.
You have decided to send [From.GetTitledFirstName] to a mercenary company. You have made sure he is well armed and he is now ready to depart after saying his final goodbyes.
On second thought, your place is here.
Good luck, [From.GetFirstName].
[From.GetBestName] has requested an audience with you. He says he has no place here at court and asks that he be allowed to join a mercenary company. He will pay for his own arms and armaments.
No. You belong here.
You have my blessing.
